attributes.action: Reduce NHS Waiting lists for auxillary services for children, Speech therapy, Physiotherapy etc
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Govt recently stated that they would screen children for speech and languge deficiencies.
THEN WHAT? No plans in place.
The average waiting time for speech therapy is 32 weeks! 
EARLY intervention is the key to successful outcomes.
Private speech therapy is £65-75/hour. Could YOU afford that?
MORE RESOURCES ARE NEEDED. 
Children deserve to be treated earlier so they can reach their potential.
